title: Cigar Authority Aug 21
itunes:title: Cigar Authority Aug 21
description: Back from the IPCPR Trade Show, Dave Garofalo brings us up to speed with all the latest and new developments inside the cigar industry. Dave and Tommy light up the newest, unknown, cigars on today's show, and share the good, the bad and the ugly. The question is... which ones will Dave buy for his shops?
